channel.title: Ömür Can Güngören
channel.description: Recent content on Ömür Can Güngören

item.title: Cut The Rope Remastered
item.description: Role: Live-Ops Developer Developed the post launch content updates for the popular Apple Arcade title Cut The Rope Remastered. Worked on various content and seasonal updates, from new gameplay features to backend and editor tools. Developed a board game feature which ended up being the main focus of the seasonal updates. Developed an Automation System to cycle through event updates without requiring to release new versions. Worked on the Analytics considering the Apple Arcade’s requirements and limitations.

item.title: My Tamagotchi Forever
item.description: Role: Live-Ops Developer Maintaining and improving the popular live mobile game My Tamagotchi Forever. Worked on various content and seasonal updates. Worked with many F2P elements such as In-App Purchases Mobile Ads and many other SDKs such as AR Developed an Automation System to cycle through event updates without requiring to release new versions. Implemented the Collection feature where it tracks and shows the player statistics for completion of the game.

item.title: Conga Line
item.description: Role: Technical Designer & Game Direction Conga Line was a project that I came up with during my time on the Ideation Team at Paladin Studios. The goal was to have followers that’ll mimic the movement and the actions of the leader (player character) and solve the puzzles and pass the platforming challenges. My initial assumption was that just seeing a line of followers behind you, taking the exact steps that you take would be fun to see and hopefully it would be fun to manage this snake-like line that you’ve created.

item.title: Windin
item.description: Role: Full-Stack Unity Developer Developed Windin’s (a casual puzzle game) core and general game mechanics. Implemented two layered unique puzzle mechanisms. Worked on UI and animations with the guidance of art direction. Developed a levelling system depending on game experience. Implemented localisation for different languages. Implemented Facebook SDK to compete scores with online friends. More on my responsibilities on this project Welcome to Windin, a casual puzzle game that will tickle your brain with its brand new wind mechanic.

item.title: Word Hero
item.description: Role: Full-Stack Unity Developer (Sole programmer) Developed a word puzzle game, Word Hero. Programmed the game on UI with many animations and interactions considering the mobile capabilities. Implemented turn based multiplayer mode using Photon Network. Implemented an AI Bot for single-player mode. Implemented Localization system, (English, Turkish) that changes both UI and gameplay languages, word databases, AI logic. Implemented a Tutorial sequence. Implemented game analytics. More on my responsibilities on this project

item.title: Merge Army!
item.description: Role: Full-Stack Unity Developer (Sole programmer) & Game Designer Developing the merging game Merge Army! Implemented an offline earning and daily bonus mechanics. Implemented mobile ads SDKs and In-App Purchase mechanics. Implemented game notifications depending on in-game states. Developed an achievement system. Implemented game analytics. Implemented Tutorial sequences. More on my responsibilities on this project Upgrade your army and weapons ! Blow down the wall !

item.title: Mine Crawler
item.description: Role: Full-Stack Developer & Game Design / Direction A turn-based roguelike mining game.

item.title: Harvest Town
item.description: Role: Full-Stack Developer & Game Design / Direction A mobile idle farming simulator that is played in real-time.

item.title: Fishing Coast
item.description: Role: Full-Stack Developer & Game Design / Direction A fishing game where you collect fishes and try to complete the catalog.

item.title: Fix N Wreck
item.description: Role: Gameplay Developer & Game Design / Direction A 4 people Couch Co-op game where a team fixes and the other team wrecks the items.

item.title: Color Hole
item.description: Role: Full-Stack Developer (Sole programmer) A clone of Color Hole game.

item.title: Hyper Tether
item.description: Role: Gameplay Developer & Game Designer GMTK Game Jam 2021 submission where the theme was Joined Together. Check it out

item.title: CV
item.description: Ömür Can Güngören Unity Developer Contact Details: orumcan@gmail.com +31 0627476003 Github: github.com/orumcan LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/orumcan Personal Profile Hello, I’m Omur, a dedicated game programmer and designer based in the Netherlands. Specialising in the development of mobile games; including casual, hyper-casual, arcade, and puzzle genres. I am proficient in C#, Java, and Unity. My recent notable contributions include the development of acclaimed titles such as Cut The Rope Remastered and My Tamagotchi Forever.
